Sentencas: Three start-up procedures for an anode-supported planar SOFC are proposed and investigated numerically in the present study.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The first is to introduce the inlet fuel at the operation temperature after the heat-up process is completed.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The second is to incorporate the anode-recycling mechanism into the start-up process.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The third is to fix the difference between the inlet-fuel temperature and the cell minimum temperature.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The numerical results obtained from the present study show that the effective maximum absolute temperature-gradient is exhibited in the early stage of the start-up process.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: For the present investigated SOFC configuration, the required start-up time for the case using methane is 3.2-fold longer than that using hydrogen.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The effective maximum absolute temperature-gradient for the case using hydrogen is 2.2-fold larger than that utilizing methane.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The endothermic internal reforming reaction of methane has a positive effect on the accommodation of the temperature uniformity during the start-up process.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures

Sentencas: The anode-recycling mechanism significantly reduces the start-up time For the fixed-temperature-difference start-up procedure, a properly selected temperature difference may lead to a smaller effective maximum absolute temperature-gradient in the early stage and a shorter start-up time by accelerating the start-up pace in the later stage.
Titulo: The analyses of the start-up process of a planar, anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell using three different start-up procedures
